price: 45. Then they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
